short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the ListenUp! chrome extension to record your calls with users on Google Meet, Zoom or even Microsoft Teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Record user interviews without intrusive bots. Get world-best transcription in 10+ languages. Custom summary with AI. Share clips to convince stakeholders.

🎙️ ListenUp! Chrome Extension helps you record user interviews the right way.
→ BOT-FREE, keep conversations natural without making people feel spied on

🍪 Key Features
👉 Record user interviews without intrusive bots
✔️ World-best transcription in 10+ languages
✔️ AI-powered summary with custom templates
✔️ AI insights with extracted video clips, easily sharable to your team or embeddable in your PRDs
✔️ AI Chat to go from question to action in 20 seconds
✔️ Link user profiles to each speaker, to easily retrieve what a specific user said across all your interviews

👉 Capture insights from any webpage
✔️ Highlight ANYTHING on the web to save it (text, images... you name it)

👉 BONUS: A centralized product discovery tool
✔️ Connect your sources of feedback to your ListenUp! account to let our AI engine automatically organize and categorize your insights, making them instantly actionable.
✔️ It also identifies patterns across your insights and classifies each by type, feature, and user sentiment.

💻 How to use:
🔸 Add the ListenUp! extension to Chrome, and pin it to your toolbar
🔸 Start your user interview on Google Meet, Zoom (web) or Teams (web)
🔸 Open the ListenUp! extension and press "start recording"
🔸 Then open ListenUp! to check the transcription, summarize the interview, and create insights
🔸 Share video clips extracted from interviews, not just lifeless quotes, to convince stakeholders
🔸 Chat with all your insights to validate hypotheses, prove your point to stakeholders during meetings, or consult existing insights to bootstrap new discoveries

📪 Contact us:
For more information, go to: http://listenup.ai/meeting-recorder

Follow this tutorial to record a call on Zoom or Microsoft Teams: http://listenup.ai/how-to-use-zoom-and-teams-on-your-web-browser-tutorial

To create your ListenUp! account and centralize your feedback, go to: http://listenup.ai/

Reach out to us at contact@listenup.ai

------------
Enjoy ✌️

The ListenUp! team
